rules.natural: Either the show funds the financial product or the show is popular.
Whenever the drug is approved for the animal, the drug is harmful to the animal.
Under the condition that the drug is approved for the animal, the drug is not harmful to the animal.
The drug is approved for the animal or, if the animal is endangered in the natural place, the show does not fund the financial product.
Either the show develops the drug or the show sponsors the financial product.
Provided that the show sponsors the financial product, the drug is not approved for the animal.
If the show researches the natural place, then the drug is not approved for the animal.
Under the condition that the show protects the animal, the show researches the natural place.
If it is not the case that whenever the show develops the drug, the show protects the animal, then the show violates the regulation.

facts.natural: The animal is endangered in the natural place.
The show does not violate the regulation.

steps.natural: The drug is not approved for the animal.
Provided that the animal is endangered in the natural place, the show does not fund the financial product.
It is not the case that the show funds the financial product.
Whenever the show develops the drug, the show protects the animal.
If the show develops the drug, then the show researches the natural place.
Under the condition that the show develops the drug, the drug is not approved for the animal.
The drug is not approved for the animal.
Provided that the animal is endangered in the natural place, the show does not fund the financial product.
It is not the case that the show funds the financial product.

natural_facts.A4: The drug is harmful to the animal.
natural_facts.A6: The show sponsors the financial product.
natural_facts.A7: The show researches the natural place.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either the show funds the financial product or the show is popular.

(A2 → ¬A1).natural: Provided that the animal is endangered in the natural place, the show does not fund the financial product.

(A3 → A4).natural: Whenever the drug is approved for the animal, the drug is harmful to the animal.

(A3 → ¬A4).natural: Under the condition that the drug is approved for the animal, the drug is not harmful to the animal.

(A3 ∨ (A2 → ¬A1)).natural: The drug is approved for the animal or, if the animal is endangered in the natural place, the show does not fund the financial product.

(A5 → A7).natural: If the show develops the drug, then the show researches the natural place.

(A5 → A8).natural: Whenever the show develops the drug, the show protects the animal.

(A5 → ¬A3).natural: Under the condition that the show develops the drug, the drug is not approved for the animal.

(A5 ∨ A6).natural: Either the show develops the drug or the show sponsors the financial product.

(A6 → ¬A3).natural: Provided that the show sponsors the financial product, the drug is not approved for the animal.

(A7 → ¬A3).natural: If the show researches the natural place, then the drug is not approved for the animal.

(A8 → A7).natural: Under the condition that the show protects the animal, the show researches the natural place.

(¬(A5 → A8) → A9).natural: If it is not the case that whenever the show develops the drug, the show protects the animal, then the show violates the regulation.

A2.natural: The animal is endangered in the natural place.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that the show funds the financial product.

¬A3.natural: The drug is not approved for the animal.

¬A9.natural: The show does not violate the regulation.
